item.description:
We'll first meet at T.G.I Fridays for light bites, or choose to enjoy a full dinner. Whatever your preference! The Movie to follow is at Regal Cape Cod Mall Stadium 12, 793 Route 132, Hyannis.

T.G.I Fridays is located at the Cape Cod Mall. It's a great place to meet before a movie.

MOVIE: The Tourist (7:05 pm)

Revolves around Frank, an American tourist visiting Italy to mend a broken heart. Elise is an extraordinary woman who deliberately crosses his path.

Cast: Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie, Paul Bettany, Timothy Dalton, Steven Berkoff

Runtime:1 hr. 43 min.

PG-13
Violence and brief strong language
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a pin that says, "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!"

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Happy Hour Bites at T.G.I Fridays with a Movie to Follow!
